name: tui-kit-ai
description: TUI-Kit-AI Monorepo - shadcn/ui for Terminal with Vercel AI SDK

scripts.validate:tsc: npm run validate:tsc:packages && npm run validate:tsc:examples
scripts.validate:tsc:packages: tsc --noEmit -p packages/core/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/ai/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/agents/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/providers/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/cli/tsconfig.json
scripts.validate:tsc:examples: tsc --noEmit -p examples/todo-agent/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p examples/code-assistant/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p examples/multi-agent/tsconfig.json
scripts.clean: npm run clean:packages && npm run clean:examples
scripts.build:examples: npm run build -w examples/todo-agent -w examples/code-assistant -w examples/multi-agent
scripts.clean:examples: npm run clean -w examples/todo-agent -w examples/code-assistant -w examples/multi-agent
